trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="AudioLevelUpdated" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento <see langword="AudioLevelUpdated" /> de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> o de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: When they are raised, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> events pass an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> to the handler for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se generan, el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> los eventos pasa una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> al controlador para el evento asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property gets the new level of audio input when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> obtiene propiedad el nuevo nivel de audio de entrada cuando el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento se desencadena.

trans-unit.source: The `AudioLevel` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes provides the current level of the audio input to the speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: El `AudioLevel` propiedad de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> clases proporciona el nivel actual de la entrada de audio para el motor de reconocimiento de voz.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an event handler to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se agrega un controlador de eventos para un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The handler outputs the new audio level to the console.
trans-unit.target: El controlador genera el nuevo nivel de audio en la consola.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new level of audio input after the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated" /> or the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nuevo nivel de entrada de audio despu√©s de que se haya producido el evento <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated" /> o <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated" />.

trans-unit.source: The new level of audio input.
trans-unit.target: El nuevo nivel de entrada de audio.
